short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension which adds extra features to NameMC!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A extension which adds extra features to NameMC! We display creation dates, deadmau5's ears, elytras, allow you to hide dashed out names (hidden names) in name history, download skin art, see custom OptiFine capes, generate a image of all your profiles, badges, and add a Skin & Cape Tester.

We are not affiliated nor endorsed by NameMC.
